segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, I have to admire his focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is barely holding him up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel his excitement, like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids will do anything for a treat, even if it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing this whole moment, which is a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’d laugh if she saw them, but she’s too busy with her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments that makes childhood so fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m smiling just watching them, even if it’s a little dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
